intrduction: I am an Android developer specializing in Jetpack Compose and MVVM, MVI architecture. I also develop open-source libraries in Kotlin to optimize and streamline software development.
ktor_admin_description: KtorAdmin is a dynamic admin panel for Ktor applications, supporting ORM structures without predefined schemas and simplifying data management with advanced features.
clipshare_description: Clipboard manager with history and cross-device sharing using P2P connections
